alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallia and northwestern Mason Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gallipolis, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Henderson, Leon, Cheshire, Gallopolis Ferry and Southside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
